me.appfriends.sdk

Class AppFriends

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.appfriends.sdk.AppFriends

  • public final class AppFriends
extends java.lang.Object
    AppFriends Core SDK main interface Created by Hacknocraft LLC on 15-10-05.

      • getInstance

        public static AppFriends getInstance()
        Retrieves the Singleton instance of the AppFriends SDK
        Returns:
        the Singleton instance of the AppFriends SDK

      • init

        public void init(android.content.Context context,
                 java.lang.String appId,
                 java.lang.String appSecret)
        Initializes the AppFriends SDK
        Parameters:
        context - Application Context
        appId - application id obtained from http://appfriends.me/
        appSecret - application secret obtained from http://appfriends.me/

      • init

        public void init(android.content.Context context)
        Initializes the AppFriends SDK

        Please supply AppFriends Application Id and Application Secrete through your App's AndroidManifest.xml 

         
  <meta-data
      android:name="me.appfriends.AppID"
      android:value="YOUR_APP_ID" />

  <meta-data
      android:name="me.appfriends.AppSecret"
      android:value="YOUR_APP_SECRET" />
        Parameters:
        context - Application Context

        Parameters:
        userId -
        username -
        Returns:
        a non-completing Observable indicating whether login is true or not

      • logout

        @Deprecated
public void logout()
        Deprecated. 
        Will be removed from SDK version 3.2.0 onwards

        Use logOut() instead Logs the current user out

      • logOut

        public rx.Completable logOut()
        Logs out the currently logged in user
        Returns:
        a Completable indicating logout status, error: trying to log out when there is no user logged in.
